text: Is there an easy way to point someone to leaving a review on your prodcut? The URL’s on the marketplace are dependent on login portal number and I can never figure out how to just easily say, “Leave us a review here”

Hey Jesse, so you can do the following:
Go to the marketplace link within the account, for example:
`<https://app.HubSpot.com/marketplace/[portalID]/products/begin-bound/flexhub-free-lp-left>`  then you can remove the portal id from the url and place a `/l/` in front of the `/marketplace/` portion. you would then end up with:
`<https://app.HubSpot.com/l/marketplace/products/begin-bound/flexhub-free-lp-left>`  that will have people redirect to the “Choose a portal” screen then to the item as viewed in their.

Sample link for you try out: <https://app.HubSpot.com/l/marketplace/products/begin-bound/flexhub-free-lp-left>

<@U25C6PU56> I think to get them directly to where it would be one click to leave a review, you would send them to this url based on what AJ posted. Since the actual review window is a modal I don’t know that you can link directly to it??

```<https://app.HubSpot.com/l/marketplace/manage-purchases>```

Thanks <@U2H3TT8F2>! Yeah I wasn’t exactly sure because I have tons of people willing to leave reviews but I’m hearing the friction of this is making them try briefly then give up. Just trying to find a better way.
<@U010F27NS6L> Yeah, a one-click is what I was aspiring to. But I realize that it may not be possible. It’s just been a challenge.
Use to be able to provide a direct link back in the day. Definitely removed this from my process due to lack of ease on the customer’s side.
